item.title: I've spent a ridiculous amount of time thinking about probabilities: An ukagaka developer's struggle for probability perfection (Advent calendar 2021)
item.description: An exploration of probabilities in YAYA, and how I eventually managed to overcome various issues to attain a perfect result (with the help of developers who knew what they were doing much better than I did!)

item.title: How to write a Needle (Advent calendar 2022)
item.description: A recounting of the process of writing Needle for Ghost Jam 2022, and how it changed the way I think about writing ghosts since then.

item.title: Ukagaka Dream Team Wiki release (Advent calendar 2022)
item.description: A release announcement for the Ukagaka Dream Team Wiki, which is now publicly available with almost all the pages up to this point filled in.

item.title: YAYA Fundamentals guide release (Advent calendar 2022)
item.description: The release of an extensive guide to YAYA in English, called YAYA Fundamentals.

item.title: Ukadoc English translation completed (Advent calendar 2023)
item.description: An announcement of the completion of the Ukadoc English translation project.

item.title: Summary of 2023 in the Ukagaka Dream Team (Advent calendar 2023)
item.description: A summary of events and other important happenings in the Ukagaka Dream Team during 2023.

item.title: FLELE mirror
item.description: A mirror download of FLELE, created based on permissions given on FLELE's distribution site. It may be helpful for those who cannot access FLELE's page.

item.title: Needle Dog mirror
item.description: A mirror download of the shell Needle Dog, created with permission from its author since the original download went down.

item.title: Spectre: What, why, and how (Advent calendar 2024)
item.description: An article describing the plugin Spectre, and also exploring the development process and various considerations we had after making it.

item.title: Summary of 2024 in the Ukagaka Dream Team (Advent calendar 2024)
item.description: A summary of events and other important happenings in the Ukagaka Dream Team during 2024.

item.title: My ghost development history
item.description: My history as a ghost developer, cataloguing as many releases and updates as I could find from before the launch of this blog.

item.title: Blog grand opening
item.description: The grand opening of this blog in its full and proper form. Everything before this point was created as a blog post without a home.

item.title: Weather Station v1.0.5
item.description: A small patch for Weather Station to fix some issues while offline.

item.title: Weather Station v1.1.0
item.description: A major update for Weather Station to overhaul various parts of the code, deprecate some references for privacy concerns, add a thumbnail, and add some new options for formatting the date and time.
